vclaim: Rep. Maxine Waters urged racial justice protesters to "stay in the street," "fight for justice," and "get more confrontational" in the event that Derek Chauvin, the former Minneapolis police officer charged with killing George Floyd, was not found guilty of murder.
title: Did Maxine Waters Urge Protesters To ‘Get More Confrontational’?
subtitle: Rep. Waters answered questions from reporters while marching with protesters ahead of a verdict in the trial of the former police officer accused of killing George Floyd.
author: Jordan Liles
